H0.text: Cathay is a poetic name for which far eastern country. Japan

H1.text: Cathay is a poetic name for which far eastern country. Korea

H2.text: Cathay is a poetic name for which far eastern country. Mongolia

H3.text: Cathay is a poetic name for which far eastern country. 中国

A4.text: The term Cathay became a poetic name for China.

A5.text: As knowledge of East Asia increased, Cathay came to be seen as the same polity as China as a whole.
